label: 松平信光
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: (?-1488) Tokugawa ancestor.  [T]he third chief [of the Matsudaira family who] greatly expanded the family's reach, pushing into the middle plain of Mikawa and occupying the castle of Anjo in 1471 (p. 133). [徳川、三河安城]
